scenario.name: ORB - Verify text and extract info

sql.data: use GENEOS ; select concat(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.timestamp),'%Y-%m-%d') , " ", DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.timestamp),'%H:%i:%s') ) as timestamp, a.username,a.workstation,a.module,a.description from audit_table a where a.module = 'SetupManager' and a.description not like '%Gateway Startup%' and DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.timestamp),'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') order by a.timestamp DESC limit 20;

use GENEOS ; select concat(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.timestamp),'%Y-%m-%d') , " ", DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.timestamp),'%H:%i:%s') ) as timestamp,
a.username,a.workstation,a.module,a.description from audit_table a where a.module = 'CommandManager' and DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.timestamp),'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') order by a.timestamp DESC limit 20;
SELECT TK1.IPAddress, UpTime, NumUsers, HostName, ClockSpeed, PercentUtilisation FROM TK1 LEFT JOIN TK2 ON TK1.IPAddress = TK2.IPAddress

SELECT `ref` as ReferenceID, `managed_entity` as ManagedEntity, from_unixtime(`timestamp`) as TimeStamp, `node_ref` as Node, `varname` as Variable, `severity` as Severity, `description` as Description FROM `event_table` WHERE SEVERITY>='1' AND 1 ORDER BY `timestamp` DESC LIMIT 100
SHOW GLOBAL STATUS where Variable_name LIKE 'aborted_connects' or Variable_name LIKE "Handler_read%" or Variable_name LIKE 'max_used_connections';
show global variables where Variable_name LIKE '%version%' or Variable_name LIKE 'max_connections';

key.data: \}.*-To \{(?<id>.*)\} -Status \{(.*)\} -Type \{(.*)\} -Freq \{(.*)\} IsCluster \{(.*)\} -ReportTime \{(.*)\} -RTDAvg \{(.*)\} -RTDMsg \{(.*)\} -RTDPeak \{(.*)\} -RTDPeakTime \{(.*)\} -SubRecIn \{(.*)\} -SubRecOut \{(.*)\} -MsgRecRecv \{(.*)\} -MsgRecSnpRecv \{(.*)\} -MsgRecSent \{(.*)\} -MsgRecSnpSent \{(.*)\} -MsgRecDisc \{(.*)\} -UpdChainIn \{(.*)\} -UpdChainOut \{(.*)\} -PubMsgIn \{(.*)\} -PubMsgOut \{(.*)\} -SubMsgIn \{(.*)\} -SubMsgOut \{(.*)\} -FcMsgIn \{(.*)\} -FcMsgOut \{(.*)\} -TrMsgIn \{(.*)\} -TrMsgOut \{(.*)\} -BytesIn \{(.*)\} -BytesOut \{(.*)\} pMsgRecRecv \{(.*)\} pMsgRecSent \{(.*)\} pUpdChainIn \{(.*)\} pUpdChainOut \{(.*)\} pPubMsgIn \{(.*)\} pPubMsgOut \{(.*)\} pSubMsgIn \{(.*)\} pSubMsgOut \{(.*)\} pFcMsgIn \{(.*)\} pFcMsgOut \{(.*)\} pMsgTrIn \{(.*)\} pMsgTrOut \{(.*)\} NumSend \{(.*)\} NumRecv \{(.*)\} ApplBytesOut \{(.*)\} ApplBytesIn \{(.*)\}

contents.data:
function extractFieldValue(line) s = split(line,":",2) str = Replace(s(1), ",", ";") extractFieldValue = trim(str) end function
function extractFieldName(line) s = split(line,":",2) str = Replace(s(0), ",", ";") extractFieldName = trim(str) end function
'***** jobfilter = "ITRS"
'***** Run the command
Set WshShell = WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set oExec = WshShell.Exec("c:\windows\system32\schtasks.exe /query /fo list /v")
newline = "" header = "" first = 1
'***** Process the output Do While oExec.StdOut.AtEndOfStream <> True
sline=oExec.StdOut.ReadLine
if sline = "" then '****This is the line break if newline <> "" then
if first = 1 and header <> "" then '**** Print column headers
header = left(header,len(header)-1) wscript.echo header header = "" first = 0 end if
'***Remove last comma newline = left(newline,len(newline)-1)
if(InStr(newline,jobfilter) > 0) then wscript.echo newline end if
newline = ""
end if
elseif (InStr(1, sline,"Folder:") > 0) or (InStr(1, sline,"INFO:") > 0) then
'wscript.echo "folder"
else
newline = newline & extractFieldValue(sline) & ","
if first = 1 then header = header & extractFieldName(sline) & "," 'wscript.echo header end if
'wscript.echo extractFieldValue(sline)
end if
Loop

function extractFieldValue(line) s = split(line,":",2) str = Replace(s(1), ",", ";") extractFieldValue = trim(str) end function
function extractFieldName(line) s = split(line,":",2) str = Replace(s(0), ",", ";") extractFieldName = trim(str) end function
'*****jobfilter = "ITRS"
'***** Run the command
Set WshShell = WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set oExec = WshShell.Exec("c:\windows\system32\schtasks.exe /query /fo list /v")
newline = "" header = "" first = 1
'***** Process the output Do While oExec.StdOut.AtEndOfStream <> True
sline=oExec.StdOut.ReadLine
if sline = "" then '****This is the line break if newline <> "" then
if first = 1 and header <> "" then '**** Print column headers
header = left(header,len(header)-1) wscript.echo header header = "" first = 0 end if
'***Remove last comma newline = left(newline,len(newline)-1)
if(InStr(newline,jobfilter) > 0) then wscript.echo newline end if
newline = ""
end if
elseif (InStr(1, sline,"Folder:") > 0) or (InStr(1, sline,"INFO:") > 0) then
'wscript.echo "folder"
else
newline = newline & extractFieldValue(sline) & ","
if first = 1 then header = header & extractFieldName(sline) & "," 'wscript.echo header end if
'wscript.echo extractFieldValue(sline)
end if
Loop
